@ numbskull20, lol your name suits you, if you actually read the details you would have known that before you downloaded it :P

PS. and just so ppl know you can get the language patch at www.brokensword25.com for english and all that, you can also direct download the game through the site too.
gets stuck in village u cant do anything to get pass

This game installed and played fine (in german), but I suggest you goto the official website and download the full version with bugs fixed and optional english language pack(not included here) all for free at www.brokensword25.com
